    • Method Detail

      • startTimer

        public void startTimer(long timeout)
        Start the callback timer. When the timer reaches zero, the callback method will call with its specified params.
        Parameters:
        timeout - The timer in milliseconds.

      • stopTimer

        public void stopTimer()
        Stop the callback timer.
        See Also:
        startTimer

      • peekTransport

        public TransportWrapper peekTransport()
        Examing the first Transport (wrapper) in the buffer, without removing it.
        Returns:
        The TransportWrapper at the start of the queue.

      • pollTransport

        public TransportWrapper pollTransport()
        Examing the first Transport (wrapper) in the buffer and remove it.
        Returns:
        The TransportWrapper to be removed.

      • addTransport

        public void addTransport(Transport transport,
                         long timeSent)
        Add a Transport to buffer.
        Parameters:
        transport - The Transport to add to the head of the queue.
        timeSent - The time this Transport was sent.

      • getAllTransports

        public java.util.Queue<TransportWrapper> getAllTransports()
        Retreive the backing buffer of Transport Wrappers.
        Returns:
        The TransportWrapper buffer
